overview: Marco Ferrari is Chief Executive Officer at Zodiak Active, the new global division of Zodiak Media Group dedicated to digital and branded content. Chief Digital Officer at Zodiak Entertainment, for more than ten years he had been Chairman and CEO of Neo Network, one of the most innovative digital companies in Italy, which he founded in 2000 and which is now part of Zodiak Active. Prior to this, Marco wrote various television shows for Mediaset and worked for leading newspaper and magazines. A professional journalist since 1996, with specialization at Columbia University in New York, he gained a degree in Law in 1994. He is a member of the Board of Directors of Zodiak Active, Magnolia Spa and Parma FC Spa. Born in Parma on 1 October 1972, he is married to Sara and has 3 children.
